reviewer_info: Posted by Muhammad Anas Ejaz on Aug 09, 2023
review_text: Its been more than a year with GLB 200. Imported it via Shahnawaz Motors Zero Meter. Almost took 6 months to arrive. Everything about this car is great, comfortable ride with a number of features. Spacious and luxurious with great fuel efficiency. Feels a little underpowered when on motorway. Other than that everything is up to the mark.
